creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Sakura's Dawn (Sakura no akebono 佐倉の曙)
text: Related to the play Hana no kumo sakura no akebono 花雲佐倉曙, performed at the Osaka Kado Theater in the 3rd lunar month 1852.
title: Actor Arashi Rikaku II as Sakura Tōgorō and an unidentified actor as Inaba no Kiemon
